pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 7 2700x or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1080, RTX 2070 or better
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
